data.name: Labyrinthus
data.detailed_description:
Can you trust your own memory? Here a maze that you should escape with your survival skils. Find the correct ways, keys ,codes and lastly watch out for evil spirits!

Story


You just kidnapped by the game developer and putted on a labyrinth. Now you have to use you memory and escape from there if you want to win the developer.

Game


Labyrinthus is a single player FPS game. You have one Flashlight , a few battery and maybe some apples around. You will get damage therefore do not forget to eat them. You will find keys and notes in the labyrinth. Do not forget the way and try to find an exit!

data.short_description: Can you trust your own memory? Here a maze that you should escape with your survival skils. Find the correct ways, keys ,codes and lastly watch out for evil spirits!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Graphics Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Version 11

content_descriptors.notes: Contains depictions of gore and other horror elements that may disturb or frighten some users.
